text: The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 6 release date and time are not too far away, and viewers are eager to learn the details. They also want to know how they can stream this episode online. This episode is titled “The Shadow in the Night.” In the previous episode, “Tel’aran’rhiod,” Egwene learned of Rand’s dark secret, while Perrin set up a risky yet bold rescue. Meanwhile, Nynaeve, Elayne, Mat, and Min pursue the Black Ajah. So, here’s all you need to know about when and where you can watch the sixth episode of The Wheel of Time Season 3. When is The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 6 release date & time? The episode’s release date is April 3, 2025, and its release time is 12 AM Pacific Time (PT) and 3 AM Eastern Time (ET). Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeApril 3, 20253:00 AMPacific TimeApril 3, 202512:00 AM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Wheel of Time Season 3, right here. Where to watch The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 6 You can watch The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 6 via Amazon Prime Video. Prime Video is a streaming service owned by Amazon. The platform provides subscribers with a variety of streaming content, spanning genres and languages. Moreover, the content offered includes both originals and licensed projects. Live-action films and television shows, animated series, and documentaries all make up Prime Video’s vast content library. Invincible, Reacher, Maxton Hall – The World Between Us, and The Terminal List are some of the streaming platform’s most popular titles. What is The Wheel of Time about? The official synopsis for The Wheel of Time is as follows: “Follow Moiraine, a member of the shadowy and influential all-female organization called the “Aes Sedai” as she embarks on a dangerous, world-spanning journey with five young men and women. Moiraine believes one of them might be the reincarnation of an incredibly powerful individual, whom prophecies say will either save humanity or destroy it.”
html:
The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 6 release date and time are not too far away, and viewers are eager to learn the details. They also want to know how they can stream this episode online. This episode is titled “The Shadow in the Night.” In the previous episode, “Tel’aran’rhiod,” Egwene learned of Rand’s dark secret, while Perrin set up a risky yet bold rescue. Meanwhile, Nynaeve, Elayne, Mat, and Min pursue the Black Ajah.

So, here’s all you need to know about when and where you can watch the sixth episode of The Wheel of Time Season 3.

When is The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 6 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is April 3, 2025, and its release time is 12 AM Pacific Time (PT) and 3 AM Eastern Time (ET).

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Wheel of Time Season 3, right here.

Where to watch The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 6

You can watch The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 6 via Amazon Prime Video.

Prime Video is a streaming service owned by Amazon. The platform provides subscribers with a variety of streaming content, spanning genres and languages. Moreover, the content offered includes both originals and licensed projects. Live-action films and television shows, animated series, and documentaries all make up Prime Video’s vast content library. Invincible, Reacher, Maxton Hall – The World Between Us, and The Terminal List are some of the streaming platform’s most popular titles.

What is The Wheel of Time about?

The official synopsis for The Wheel of Time is as follows:

“Follow Moiraine, a member of the shadowy and influential all-female organization called the “Aes Sedai” as she embarks on a dangerous, world-spanning journey with five young men and women. Moiraine believes one of them might be the reincarnation of an incredibly powerful individual, whom prophecies say will either save humanity or destroy it.”
